verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We're dust to dust
Breathing amazing grace
Beloved of God
Never to be the same

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Your name is great
You are good so good
And You always keep Your promises

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Your ways of loving us
Are so high so high
Your ways of loving us
Are so high so high

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Your ways of loving us
So deep and wide
And never will they change
How we love Your ways

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Because because
You are enough for us
We cast our cares
Trusting Your heart for us

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
And You won't betray
Your faithifulness

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
You are always good and good to all
You're the grace in every morning sun
This is I know I am known
I am held and I am loved

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
You're the refuge for the restless heart
And You sing a new song over us
This is I know I am known
I am held and I am loved

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
So deep and wide
And never will they change

verse.name: v10
verse.lines:
So deep and wide
And never will they change
How we love Your ways
